name: Safe Browse
tagline: Helps you keep your kids and other users from accessing bad content on the Internet by letting you control which sites to block and which sites to allow.
body:
v2.0.0.0:

 Issue 1  Integrate app with Canada Inc Library
 Issue 8  App cannot open PDF links
 Issue 10  user gets a failed to open page
 Issue 17  Report if user is offline
 Issue 19  Allow displaying multiple tabs
 Issue 20  Improve startup performance
 Issue 21  Allow clearing cache
 Issue 23  Implement 10.3 signature actions
 Issue 24  Integrate with Canada Inc tutorial API
 Issue 25  Update assets
 Issue 26  Integrate validator API into password field
 Issue 27  Refresh guardian login flow
 Issue 28  If there are a lot of entries in the blocked list it the fade transition can take a long time
 Issue 29  Implement placeholders when lists are empty
 Issue 30  Add icons for all toasts
 Issue 31  First letter is capitalized when entering addresses in dialog
 Issue 32  Implement video tutorial
 Issue 33  Implement log collection during bug report
 Issue 34  Implement new About title bar in help page
 Issue 35  Move all logic to native code
 Issue 36  Implement Safe Run mode
 Issue 37  Support blocking websites by keywords in title
 Issue 38  Sort log most recent to least recent
 Issue 39  Implement 10.1 keyboard shortcuts
 Issue 40  Allow pin to homescreen feature
 Issue 41  Hook into native search framework
 Issue 42  Don't fire unnecessary change events when updating settings
 Issue 43  If guardian already logged in save the session until app restart
 Issue 44  If a website is set as homepage in Controlled mode also whitelist it
 Issue 45  Allow unblocking multiple sites at the same time
 Issue 46  Validate permissions
v1.2.0.0:

 Issue 1 : Integrate app with Canada Inc Library.
 Issue 2 : Support https protocol.
 Issue 3 : Websites with multiple periods in the URL do not work.
 Issue 4 : Add support for filtering only blocked sites in the log.
 Issue 5 : Add invocation target.
 Issue 6 : After refreshing a blocked site we end up at the app level directory.
 Issue 7 : General software refactoring & performance improvements.
v1.0.0.0 (Initial release):

Browsing features: Back, forward, browse, reload.
Encrypt password, and once user logged in, no need to ask them to log in again until next app restart.
Help page includes screenshots to BB10 parental controls.
Log activity to allow user to see logs.
Unlimited wrong logins allowed.
Initial browsing modes (match by host name): Controlled & Passive.
Allow homepage setting.
Change password feature.
Known issue with framed-websites that don't render properly.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
